TopicTitle: [.23]Porcine Avionics' Graphic Guide to Efficient Science Gathering

Articles.Content:
Ok, so you've gathered your samples from the landing pad and the grass at KSC. Now what? This quick guide shows how you can completely fill out the tech tree in 10 launches or less. I was able to complete the tree with 7 launches. Your mileage may vary. Happy science!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Followed this until the Last Rocket. I can't make up many of the parts in the upper part. Is it possible to get a more detailed view or a file I can load and look at or something?

Followed this until the Last Rocket. I can't make up many of the parts in the upper part. Is it possible to get a more detailed view or a file I can load and look at or something?
